txt.en:
<rgb=#00e4ff>This quest has been restored for Legendary Servers!</rgb>

'Greetings, [placeholder]. I've lived in Archet all my life and have hunted game throughout the forests since I was strong enough to wield a bow; but never before have I seen the marsh-flies grown to such a menace as they have now.

'There is clearly something wrong here and isn't simply wild growth.

'If you could kill some of the pests I would reward you for your efforts. And, [placeholder], if you could find further information for me I would be indebted to you.'
'Ah good, you have returned...and with tales of success no doubt!  \n\n'Here then, take this as your reward.  Good luck in your adventures, [placeholder].'
'You'll find the flies make their nests and pestering grounds just surrounding the lake near the lodge.'
Fenton Marshley is concerned about the recent boom in the local marsh-fly population.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest will be cancelled if you complete or skip 'Intro: The Assault on Archet'.</rgb>
Starter Quest: 'Skimming the Surface' has been discarded
Marsh-flies can be found near the lake east of Archet.\n\nFenton Marshley has asked you to hunt down the marsh-flies that plague Archet.
Talk to Fenton Marshley at the Hunter's Lodge
Fenton Marshley is near the Hunter's Lodge, east of Archet.\n\nYou should return to Fenton Marshley for your reward.
